body: Bro I want this to be translated like RN

Well from my understanding girl hates to loose and asks the smartest guy at school to teach her. While they study together he get's a boner and then it proceeds to them having sex and eventually the girl turns it into a competition until she "defeats" him in sex. Then last page has his grades have started to drop and she tells him that now it's her turn to "teach" him and the guy is unsure if their a "couple" or she just wants him for sex. But either way he has to work harder to make sure his grades doesn't drop even further.
EY!! I NEED AN ASSERTIVE GF TOO!!
